author: lveldere
body:
Migration to thread-safe DQMstore
- code in FastSimulation/CaloRecHitsProducer/test/ is no longer relevant and was removed
- DQMstore no longer used in FastSimulation/Calorimetry and FastSimulation/ShowerDevelopment 
  (the affected classes are used in a producer, DQMstore is not available in producers)
- FastSimulation/TrackingRecHitProducer/test/SiPixelRecHitsInputDistributionsMaker.*
  migrated to thread-safe DQMstore

zero regression expected
title: Fastsim threadsafe dqm
